channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, ond beth ydi'r golau disglair sydd yn pefrio mor ddel? Everyone loves the Sparkles and it soon becomes a game of trying to catch them.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Odo
channel.desc: Er mwyn i Iago neud ffrindiau rhaid iddo fe fod "yn fe ei hunan", yn ol Odo a Dwdl. Odo and Doodle help John John with how to make friends by "being yourself.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ahoi!
channel.desc: Pwy fydd y m?r-ladron sy'n ymuno ? Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caban Banana Gareth
channel.desc: Mi fydd Gareth yr Orangutan yn teithio ysgolion ledled Cymru yn trafod pob math o bynciau. Wythnos yma, Gwyliau ydi'r pwnc trafod. This week, Holiday is the topic of discussion.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Mae Harri a'r Octonots yn helpu hen ffrindiau, y Crancod Cnau Coco, i ddarganfod pwy sy'n dwyn eu cnau coco. Harri and the Octonauts help their old friends the Coconut Crabs.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Gwyneth Gwrtaith yn cynnal te prynhawn. Ond mae pethau'n mynd yn anniben iawn pan bod gyrr o wartheg yn ymyrryd. An afternoon tea turns into chaos when a herd of cows turn up.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patrol Pawennau
channel.desc: Pam fod Maer Campus yn ymddwyn gymaint fel babi? Ydi o rhywbeth i'w wneud ? llaeth y gneuen goco aur mae o wedi ei yfed? Why is Mayor Campus acting like a baby.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Parc Glan Gwil
channel.desc: Mae Tref yn cael trafferth gyda'r peiriant golchi ac mae llanast yn y golchdy! Tref is having trouble with the washing machine and there is a mess in the laundry.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Carlo Bach
channel.desc: Heddiw mae Carlo yn mynd i'r Gorllewin Gwyllt. Beth mae cowboi angen, tybed? Today Carlo goes to the Wild West. What does a cowboy need.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Joni Jet
channel.desc: Mae Joni eisiau datgelu mai fo yw Jetboi er mwyn creu argraff ar fachgen cwl. Joni wants to reveal that he is Jetboy in order to impress a cool boy.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
channel.desc: Mae Plwmp a Deryn eisiau chwarae ar y si-so. Ond, yn anffodus, nid yw'r si-so'n gweithio'n iawn. Plwmp and Deryn want to play on the see-saw, but unfortunately, it's not working properly.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Blero heddiw, tybed? What's happening in the Blero world today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Tad-cu
channel.desc: Pam bod pengwiniaid ddim yn gallu hedfan? Dyma cwestiwn Ela i Tad-cu heddiw. 'Why can't Penguins fly?' is the question Ela asks Tad-cu today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blociau Lliw
channel.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn canfod ei bod yn hwyl i liwio pethau'r lliwiau anghywir. The Colourblocks discover that it can be fun to colour things the wrong colour.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Digbi Draig
channel.desc: Mae'n Ddiwrnod y Ddraig ac eleni mae Digbi'n benderfynol o hedfan ei orau glas. It's Dragon Day, and this year, Digby's determined to beat his best-ever flying record.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu marchogaeth ei geffyl am y tro cyntaf gan nad yw ei gar na'i garaf?n yn gweithio. Crawc decides to ride his horse as car and caravan are out of action.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Fferm Fach
channel.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae afalau yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd ? hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Apples come from.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Timpo
channel.desc: Mae'n gynnar yn y bore ac mae Pili Po wedi colli ei het yn barod. Bydd rhaid dilyn ?l ei droed i weld lle fedr yr het fod. It's early in the morning and Pili Po has already lost his hat.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cymylaubychain
channel.desc: Mae'n noswyl cyn dydd y Seren ac mae pawb yn y nen wedi cyffroi'n l?n! It's the night before the night of the special star and everyone is very excited.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw mae ganddo ffrind newydd - bachgen mewn drych. Pablo befriends a boy in a mirror - but being pals with a reflection has its limitations.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Odo
channel.desc: Gofynna Dwdl i Odo i'w dysgu sut i fod yn ddoniol! Doodle asks Odo to teach her how to be funny.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ahoi!
channel.desc: Pwy fydd y m?r-ladron sy'n ymuno ? Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dilyn mamau pengwin ymerodrol sydd ar eu ffordd adref at eu teuluoedd. The Octonauts follow emperor penguin mums returning to their families.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patrol Pawennau
channel.desc: Ar ddiwrnod dathlu ieir mae Clwcsanwy ar goll. All y Pawenlu helpu Maer Morus ei ffeindio hi? On chicken celebration day Clwcsanwy is missing. Can the Paw Patrol help Mayor Morus find her.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Parc Glan Gwil
channel.desc: Mae Tref Trefn wedi trefnu noson gyda band enwog yn Parc Glan Gwil - ond alla nhw ddim dod! Trefn Trefn has organised an evening with a famous band in Parc Glan Gwil - but they can't come.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Gyda Lowri'n mynd am ei thriniaeth chemo cyntaf, mae Philip yn teimlo'n fwy pell byth oddi wrthi. Mae gan y doctor newyddion am gyflwr Rhys. The doctor has some news about Rhys' condition.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
channel.desc: Y tro hwn mae'r daith yn mynd i'r mor i gwrdd a Cheffyl y mor ac i ben y coed i gwrdd a'r Gibon. We journey under the sea to meet the Sea Horse and up into the trees to find the Gibbon.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Deian a Loli
channel.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Deian a Loli heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Deian and Loli's world today.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Pan ma'r Whws yn gweld morgrug yn cario pethau cymaint yn fwy na nhw, mae nhw'n tybio bod gan y pryfaid uwch-bwerau. The Woohoos see ants carrying items and wonder if they have superpowers.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam Tan
channel.desc: Mae Sara isie neud fideo roc o Trefor Ifans a'i iwcalele. Mae pethau'n mynd o chwith a Sam yw'r seren ond mae Trefor yn rocio! Sarah wants to make a rock video of Trevor and his ukulele.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Cyfle i ddarganfod y pethau cryf a chlyfar sy'n rhan o fyd natur, fel, metelau, deimwntau, y planhigyn Fagl Gwener a dwr. We learn how water can alter the shape of the landscape.

channel.title: Og y Draenog Hapus

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Mae Mishmosh wedi adeiladu peiriant enfawr sy'n medru twnelu'n llawer cynt na thyrchod. Mishmosh has built an enormous machine that can tunnel much quicker than moles.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Dewch ar daith o gwmpas y byd. Heddiw rydyn ni'n ymweld ? Gwlad Thai. Today we learn about Thailand - its religion, Buddhism, the food such as Pad Thai, the city of Bangkok, and more.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n gwneud ffilmiau! Ond mae Pip yn cael trafferth meddwl beth i'w wneud. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are making their own movies.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn helpu Adam yng Ngardd Fotaneg Genedlaethol Cymru. Today, Hanna gardens with her father, we meet Alffi the therapy dog, and Huw visits Ffion and her horse.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Oi! Osgar

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Efaciw?s
channel.desc: Mae'r efaciw?s wedi setlo yng nghefn gwlad Cymru'r 40au ac wedi gwneud ffrindiau da efo'r plant lleol. The air raid warden teaches the kids what to do in the event of German bombing.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam Tan
channel.desc: Mae Jams yn gofyn a gofyn i Malcolm os allith e fod yn ddirprwy iddo, ac mae Jams yn datrys "Pwy wnaeth ddwyn y brechdanau?". James keeps asking Malcolm whether he can be his deputy.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach...
channel.desc: Heddiw, byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae'r byd yn troi, beth yw rhewlif a sut mae'n symud, a llawer mwy. Today we discover how different plants grow at different rates, and learn about wind.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Guto Gwningen a'i ffrindiau. The animated tales of a little bunny and his friends.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Help Llaw
channel.desc: Mae'r lifft wedi torri ar lethr sgio Penbre, felly ffwrdd a Harri i'w drwsio gyda Bronwen. Mae'n waith llwglyd! The ski lift has broken in Pembre, so Harri goes to fix it with Bronwen.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
channel.desc: Y comed?wr Kiri Pritchard-Mclean, a'r artist portreadau Corrie Chiswell sy'n gweithio tuag at bortread tro hwn. Comedian Kiri Pritchard-Mclean is painted by portrait artist Corrie Chiswell.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Trysorau Cymru
channel.desc: Yn y rhaglen olaf, adeilad rhestredig Gradd I Erddig, ger Wrexham, sy'n cael ein sylw. In the last episode, we look at the Grade-I listed National Trust property of Erddig in Wrexham.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gerddi Cymru
channel.desc: Aled Samuel sy'n ymweld ? gardd Castell Picton yn Sir Benfro a Gardd Wyndcliffe yn Sir Fynwy. Aled Samuel visits gardens at Picton Castle, Pembrokeshire and Wyndcliffe Court, Monmouthshire.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Prynhawn Da
channel.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Priodas Pum Mil
channel.desc: Ry' ni yn Sir F?n yn trefnu priodas Meg a Luke. Ma gan Luke, efo help Trystan, rywbeth fyny ei lawes sy'n rhoi dipyn o sioc i Emma a Meg! We're in Anglesey organising Meg and Luke's wedding.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yr Whws
channel.desc: Mae mwydod yn codi i'r wyneb yn agos i ble mae Tomi'n canu ac yn martsio, ac mae'r Whws eisiau gwybod pam. Some worms wriggle out of the ground, and the Woohoos are intrigued to know why.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pentre Papur Pop
channel.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn edrych ymlaen i fynd ar antur campio mawr. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are excited to go on a camping trip.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
channel.desc: Heddiw, awn ar antur i wlad fwyaf De America, sef Brasil. This time, we go to Brazil where they speak Portuguese and where one of the most famous landmarks is the Christ the Redeemer statue.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twm Twrch
channel.desc: Mae'r Garddwr yn cael syniad da i greu cynllun i adael Medwyn y Mwydyn ar y stryd, er mwyn i Twm Twrch a Dorti ofalu amdano. The Gardener has a good idea involving poor Medwyn the worm.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Help Llaw
channel.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad i weud fod ffens wedi torri ar y fferm, a'r anifeiliaid am ddianc! Harri gets a call to say that a fence has broken on the farm, and the animals are trying to escape.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Oi! Osgar
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Chwarter Call
channel.desc: Digonedd o hwyl a chwerthin gyda teulu'r Anhygoels, Llew ac Od, a chriw Steddfod Sili. Join Cadi, Luke, Jed and Miriam in the comedy series Chwarter Call.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Arthur a Chriw y Ford Gron
channel.desc: O na! Does dim hawl gan Arthur i gymeryd rhan mewn cystadleuaeth gan nad oes ganddo waed nobl. Arthur is not allowed to take part in a joust because he's not of noble blood. What will he do.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: LEGO? DREAMZzz
channel.desc: Mae'r Cwsgarwyr yn rhuthro i achub Logan ond buan iawn yr aiff pethau o chwith iddynt. The Dream Chasers rush to save Logan from the Shadowkeep's dungeon.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
channel.desc: Teithia Sue ac Emrys i Abu Dhabi i weld Rod y mab wrth ei waith i'r teulu brenhinol ar yr ynys breifat. Sue and Emrys' son competes in a show with over ?10m dirhams prize money up for grabs.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Clwb Rygbi Uchafbwyntiau
channel.desc: This is C.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm
channel.desc: Daw Mark i wybod am gyfrinach Ffion. Sut fydd Gaynor yn ymdopi gyda'r gwir? Gaynor corners Tom, will he confess everything? Ffion tells Mark about her affair.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae perthynas Mathew ac Elen yn parhau i flodeuo a'r ddau yn cytuno ei bod hi'n amser i ddatgelu'r newyddion. Kelvin works hard on his secret plan - which creates big problems in the caf?.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Byd yn ei Le
channel.desc: Cyfres wleidyddol sy'n dadansoddi'r diweddara o'r byd gwleidyddol. Political series which analyses the latest from the political world.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Adeiladu'r Freuddwyd
channel.desc: Dilynwn Emilie a Jon a werthodd popeth i brynu tir yng Ngorllewin Cymru i greu safle glampio. Ond ma heriau yn eu disgwyl. Series following a couple setting up a glamping site in West Wales.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Llinell Las
channel.desc: Golwg ar waith Uned Plismona'r Ffyrdd Heddlu Gogledd Cymru. Tro ma mae na ddamwain car ac mae'r criw yn delio gyda chyffuriau. This time, there's a car accident & the team have a drugs case.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Arfordir Cymru
channel.desc: Mae Bedwyr yn mynd i granca ac yn gweld bod enwau llafar yn gallu arwain at hanesion rhyfeddol. Bedwyr Rees discovers that local, colloquial names on Anglesey lead to interesting tales.
